metadata.title: Merrell Fullbench 2 SD Steel Toe Work Shoe Men's
features: Synthetic leather and mesh upper. Work shoe with steel safety toe and static dissipative protection. Bellows tongue helps keep debris out. Traditional lace-up style with fabric laces and tonal eyelets for a secure fit. Protective, abrasion-resistant rubber toe cap. Heel pull tab. Padded mesh collar for added comfort. Breathable mesh lining offers a great in-shoe feel.

KINETIC FIT blended EVA contoured footbed with zonal arch support and heel cushioning for daylong comfort. Air cushioning in the heel absorbs impacting shock and adds stability. Lightweight nylon arch shank supplies flexible support. Outsole is oil and slip resistant and is Mark II tested. M Select GRIP rubber outsole with 3mm lug depth offers excellent traction and grip on various surfaces.

Steel safety toe meets ASTM F2413-11 I/75 C/75 ESD safety standards. Static Dissipative (SD) rated ASTM F2412-11. Imported. Product measurements were taken using size 11, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 3 oz
description: Lace into full-on work mode. Fullbench 2 SD ST is designed with a rugged mesh upper, breathable lining, ASTM-compliant static dissipative technology, and an oil-, heat- and slip-resistant Merrell M Select GRIP outsole. FEATURES Mesh and 3D print upper Bellows tongue keeps out debris Protective and abrasion resistant rubber toe cap Breathable mesh lining Kinetic Fit Advanced blended EVA contoured footbed with added zonal arch and heel support Merrell air cushion Viz with high rebound EVA foam pod in the heel absorbs shock and adds stability Molded nylon arch shank for midfoot support and flexibility Steel Toe protection; rated ASTM F2413-18 I/C EH rated ASTM F2413-18 Static Dissipative (SD) rated ASTM F2412-18 Oil and slip resistant rubber outsole; Mark II tested Merrell M Select GRIP rubber tunes each outsole with durable traction that grips when and where you need it Heat resistant outsole provides foot protection for brief periods of direct contact that meet or exceed 500 °F 3mm lug depth Weight: 1lb 14oz / 873g
